patthana23.5:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.5:4.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana23.5:5.1: Nakusalaṃ naavitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.5:5.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana23.5:6.1: Nakusalaṃ naavitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.5:6.3: Hetuyā dvādasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate dvādasa.
